item.title: could not bind to address [::]:80 - Webserver port 80 blocked on Windows
item.description: Several Windows services might block port 80 and the local webserver like Apache HTTP or Nginx from starting. PS C:\www\httpd-2.4.46-win64-VS16\Apache24> .\bin\httpd.exe (OS 10013)An attempt was made to access a socket in a way forbidden by its access permissions. : AH00072: make_sock: could not bind to address [::]:80 (OS 10013)An attempt was made to access a socket in a way forbidden by its access permissions. : AH00072: make_sock: could not bind to address 0.
